Text: whoa 8gb for a frickin movie wtf i dont think so no movie should be 8gb

@terrysilver - Well then don't download it you stupid fuck. There are lots of other versions with lower quality and smaller file size out there for you to download. Some of us is smart enough realize that if you want better movie quality the file size will be larger. You simply don't compress a 1080p bluray movie to ~2gb and expect to keep the image quality
